name: Attack
description: A standard attack.

name: Reinforce
description: Increases armor for next two times being hit.

name: Boern Skill 2
description: Parry - next hit damage is negated and attacks back?

name: Stand Behind Me
description: Buff for people behind him, taunt for % taken

name: Toughen
description: Increases maxHP and heals for the same amount

name: Cedric Skill 2
description: Taunt for next two times hit

name: Cedric Skill 3
description: Reduce max HP but increase damage

name: Exert
description: Consumes a portion of HP to deal additional damage

name: Grim Skill 2
description: Attack and heal himself if they have titus debuff

name: Grim Skill 3
description: Drain HP cleave (first two)

name: Lambug Skill 1
description: Cleave (first two)

name: Frontload
description: Large attack that decreases damage each recast

name: Lambug Skill 3
description: Increase damage until she's lost health

name: Meteor
description: Attacks all enemies and applies the scorched debuff. Enemies with the scorched debuff take damage every turn

name: Zoe 2
description: Single target scorched debuff. Enemies with scorched take damage every turn

name: Zoe 3
description: Bomb build up, on third cast BOOM

name: Frost Strike
description: Attacks and applies a chilled effect. If the target already has the chilled effect, this deals increased damage

name: Neve Skill 2
description: Blizzard, two casts a round, aoe damge, apply chill (no additional effect)

name: Neve Skill 3
description: Self-immunity ice wall

name: Transfer Life
description: Deals damage to ally in front to damage an enemy over time

name: Titus Skill 2
description: Hurts unit behind (not grim) of him to apply DoT

name: Titus Skill 3
description: Apply DoT to everyone (not titus or grim)

name: Holy Prayer
description: Heal the teammate with the lowest % missing HP

name: Troy Skill 2
description: AoE heal?

name: Troy Skill 3
description: Heal over four turns (so targets gets healed on every one of troy's turns)

name: Inspire
description: Inspires all teammates, increasing their HP

name: Inspire 2
description: Inspires all teammates, increasing their Pow

name: Inspire 3
description: Inspires all teammates, increasing their Tech

name: Snipe
description: Attack enemy with lowest HP. If less than 50% deal additional damage

name: Grog 2
description: Attack third unit, if scorched consume and deal additional damage

name: Grog 3
description: Attack fourth unit, if full health deal additional damage.

name: Double Tap
description: Attacks twice in the same round.

name: Revere 2
description: Attack second unit, if chilled do additional damage

name: Revere 3
description: More damage if end health # is a 7.

name: Target Mark
description: Marks the second unit in enemy list to focus team attacks and attacks

name: Target Mark 2
description: Marks the third unit in enemy list to focus team attacks and attacks

name: Target Mark 3
description: Marks the fourth unit in enemy list to focus team attacks and attacks

name: Swift Strike
description: Attacks the enemy and heals for the same amount.

name: Regenerate
description: Heals self instead of attacking

name: Wilt
description: Reduce healing of target attacked

name: Full Force
description: Massive damage if at full health

name: Translucent
description: Negates damage taken next time being hit.

name: Purge
description: Removes all debuffs from allies and damages for each debuff removed

name: Overpower
description: Deals additional damage if below 50% HP

name: Helping Hand
description: Heals teammate

name: Lasers
description: Deal a powerful magical attack to the enemy.

name: Crab Hammer
description: Attacks for 25% of max HP of defender

name: Viking Smash
description: Deals triple damage

name: Stronger Together
description: Heals for each living ally

name: Bonesplosion
description: Deals massive damage to each enemy

name: Bone Up
description: Regenerates to full health

name: Sleepytime
description: Maybe he's doing yoga?

name: Tree Wallop
description: High damage attack to second in order

name: Prickly Personality
description: Attacking this enemy damages the hero

name: Needle Barrage
description: Hurls a thousand needles at the two nearest targets

name: Forgotten Wish
description: Redistributes enemy health to be equal

name: Decay
description: Deals 2% max HP damage to each enemy

name: Bone Down
description: When dead, turn into a pile of bones instead

name: Blank Canvas
description: Attack a Hero and absorb their Type

name: Masterpiece
description: Attack and perform an action based off form - Mighty: Gain stacking protective shield. Mindful: Heal and gain a % heal buff. Moxious: Add debuff to take additional damage

name: Rising Phoenix
description: Once below 25%, Phoenix will turn into an egg and attempt to regenerate health

name: Phoenix Fire
description: Burns the first enemy, dealing damage for every stack

name: Hibernate
description: Monster is sleeping and performs no action

name: Rise
description: Monster returns to its original form
